product_overview: This frontend application, built with Next.js and styled with Tailwind CSS and CSS Modules, provides user authentication, company management, a public home page, and a blog, integrating seamlessly with backend APIs and featuring a reusable component library and theming capabilities.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication with registration, login, and session management.
Allow authenticated users to view and manage company-related data.
Provide a welcoming public home page for visitors.
Showcase blog posts to inform and engage visitors.
Ensure smooth integration with backend APIs for data operations.
Maintain a consistent and reusable UI component library for developer efficiency.
Implement flexible theming for a cohesive visual experience across the app.
key_features: Authentication system including user login, registration, and session handling.
Company management functionality allowing users to manage company information.
Public home page designed for visitor engagement and application overview.
Blog feature to display and read posts about the product/company.
API integration layer facilitating communication with backend services.
Reusable UI components categorized by function such as Core, Data-Display, Form, Layout, Theme, and Utilities.
Application-wide theming for consistent visual styling and user experience.
user_flow_summary: New user registration flow allowing account creation and onboarding.
User login and session management to maintain secure access.
Authenticated user flow to view, edit, and manage company data.
Visitor browsing flow on the public home page to understand the application.
Visitor reading flow for browsing and reading blog posts.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration, login, and session persistence across sessions.
Authenticated users can perform CRUD operations on company data as permitted.
Public home page loads correctly and displays intended overview content.
Blog posts render accurately and support reading without errors.
API calls complete successfully, handling expected and error states gracefully.
UI components render consistently across supported devices and themes.
Application theming applies correctly and can switch between defined themes without visual glitches.
